archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.3.4d: d) provide assurance that critical or sensitive information will be protected at all times (i.e. maintaining its confidentiality, integrity and availability) including during and after termination of a service
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
